title: Marsden
name: Standedge Tunnel & Visitor Centre
directions: half a mile west of the station; 15-minute walk along towpath; water taxi available at weekends
content: Standedge Tunnel (opened 1811) is the longest canal tunnel in Britain. It was closed in 1944 but reopened after restoration in 2001. Café, exhibition and soft play area at the Visitor Centre.
